mapper.insert: INSERT INTO NOTE (N_BNO, N_SENDER, N_RECEIVER, N_CONTENT, N_S_TIME, N_READ_CHK, N_R_DELETE_CHK, N_S_DELETE_CHK, PNO, N_REVIEW) VALUES(NOTE_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{n_sender}, #{n_receiver}, #{n_content}, TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MM:SS'), 1, 1, 1, #{pno}, #{n_review})
mapper.select:
SELECT N_BNO, N_SENDER, N_RECEIVER, N_CONTENT, N_S_TIME, N_READ_CHK, N_R_DELETE_CHK, N_S_DELETE_CHK, PNO FROM(SELECT N_BNO, N_SENDER, N_RECEIVER, N_CONTENT, N_S_TIME, N_READ_CHK, N_R_DELETE_CHK, N_S_DELETE_CHK, PNO, ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY N_BNO DESC) AS RNUM FROM NOTE WHERE 1 = 1
) NOTE WHERE RNUM BETWEEN #{rowStart} AND #{rowEnd} ORDER BY N_BNO DESC

AND N_BNO > 0
